General.Name: Lider Faktoring AS
General.Description: Lider Faktoring A.S. operates as a factoring company in Turkey. It offers collection and cash management services. The company was formerly known as Lider Faktoring Hizmetleri A.S. and changed its name to Lider Faktoring A.S. in July 2013. Lider Faktoring A.S. was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Buyukdere Cad. Maya Akar Center 100-102, Istanbul, Turkey, 34394
